com.untamedears.contraptions.properties

Class ContraptionProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.untamedears.contraptions.properties.ContraptionProperties
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FactoryProperties

    public abstract class ContraptionProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies the properties of a Contraption's implementation

    A Contraption's properties define how all Contraptions of that type behave. Each Contraption implementation will have a accompanying properties implementation which specifies for the Contraption its material, ID, common name, and collection of widgets. This differs from the Contraption's resources which are specific variables held by a contraption object dictating its current state.
